actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the relief of the trustee of the bondholders of the Bankers Joint Stock Land Bank of Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay the unpaid balance of specified bonds issued by a named bank and presently held in trust. Directs the trustee to distribute such moneys to the beneficiaries of such trust.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the relief of the trustee of the bondholders of the Bankers Joint Stock Land Bank of Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
